description: Dyanmically generates /etc/ssh/known_hosts based on search indexes

recipes.ssh_known_hosts::default: Dyanmically generates /etc/ssh/known_hosts based on search indexes

name: ssh_known_hosts
long_description:
= DESCRIPTION: 

Build /etc/ssh/known_hosts based on search indexes and build it based on data retrieved by ohai.

= REQUIREMENTS: 

== Platform: Doesn't matter, should work on anything.

= USAGE:

Generates /etc/ssh/known_hosts based on search indexes for RSA keys.
